price: Maka Allah merasakan kepada mereka kehinaan pada kehidupan dunia. Dan sesungguhnya azab pada hari akhirat lebih besar kalau mereka mengetahui.
arabic: فَأَذَاقَهُمُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡخِزۡيَ فِي ٱلۡحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنۡيَاۖ وَلَعَذَابُ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ أَكۡبَرُۚ لَوۡ كَانُواْ يَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: fa-adhāqahumu al-lahu al-khiz'ya fī al-ḥayati al-dun'yā walaʿadhābu al-ākhirati akbaru law kānū yaʿlamūna
